summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Box Inventory Tracking App. Backend APIs working well with minor validation issue. Frontend fully functional with all features working correctly.

minor_bugs.issue: Allows creating boxes with empty names (should return 422 validation error but returns 200)
minor_bugs.impact: Data quality issue - users can create boxes without names

passed_tests: Dashboard page loads with correct stats (total box types, inventory, value, low stock count)
Add new box type via Inventory page works correctly
Edit existing box type functionality works
Delete box type with confirmation dialog works
Record usage functionality works and deducts from quantity
Low stock alert appears correctly when quantity <= min_threshold
Usage trends chart displays (though no historical data in test)
Usage history table shows recent records
Navigation between all pages works smoothly
All CRUD operations for boxes work
Usage recording with quantity validation works
Error handling for insufficient stock works
API endpoints return proper status codes
action_item_for_main_agent: Add validation to prevent creating boxes with empty names in the backend API
success_percentage: Backend: 95% (19/20 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (all core features working)
